title: Set FONNTE_TOKEN secret for production OTP delivery
description: BLOCKER: Dashboard login works but OTPs only log to console (OTP_DEV_MODE). Need to register at fonnte.com, connect WhatsApp number, copy device token, then run: `pnpm wrangler secret put FONNTE_TOKEN --env production -c packages/dashboard-bff/wrangler.toml` and `pnpm wrangler secret delete OTP_DEV_MODE --env production -c packages/dashboard-bff/wrangler.toml`. No code changes needed â€” provider abstraction is already in place.
